Author: HauntingGuarantee
Text: I can relate, kinda. The guy i'm seeing seems to always pinch my upper arms, waist and thighs. I don't think it's on purpose to make me feel fat but it's like dude, please stop.  Also triggering when you see they follow girls on social media who are super thin... That always makes me want to restrict.
